author: Hilary Brueck
title: The truth about face masks and the coronavirus: Mask-wearing in crowded places may help reduce the spread, but it isn't a perfect solution
description: Scientific studies about how effective masks are remain inconclusive. Some show they might help prevent illnesses from spreading a bit, but others suggest they're not worth putting on. Because the novel coronavirus appears to be easily spread by asymptomatic …
content:
When reports emerged that a strange new illness was spreading in Wuhan, China, epidemiologist and statistician Elaine Shuo Feng was more than 730 miles away from the disease's epicenter, in her hometown of Tianjin.
There, everyone sprang into action, she sai… [+10870 chars]
